com.scalar.dl.ledger.crypto

Class DigitalSignatureValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.dl.ledger.crypto.DigitalSignatureValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignatureValidator

    @Immutable
public class DigitalSignatureValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements SignatureValidator
    A validator used to validate that a given byte array was signed by the private key corresponding to the specified certificate using the specified algorithm.

      • validate

        public boolean validate(byte[] toBeValidated,
                        byte[] signatureBytes)
        Validates the signature corresponds to the certificate.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface SignatureValidator
        Parameters:
        toBeValidated - a byte array whose signature will be validated
        signatureBytes - the bytes of the signature
        Returns:
        true if the signature corresponds to the toBeValidated bytes; false otherwise
        Throws:
        SignatureException - if it fails to validate
